00028 #ifndef MODEL_DIRECTOR_H_
00029 #define MODEL_DIRECTOR_H_
00030 
00031 #include "Model_Builder.h"
00032 #include "Model.h"
00033 
00034 //!The Director class of the Builder pattern
00035 /**
00036  * Simple steps: Use the builder to
00037  * 1. Create Refiner
00038  * 2. Create a pipeline of filters to perform the
00039  *    various refinements defined by the Refiner
00040  * 3. Create a strategy to execute the pipeline of filters
00041  * 4. Execute the strategy
00042  * 5. Return the model inside the builder that has been refined
00043  *    by the strategy
00044  */
00045 class Model_Director {
00046 public:
00047     Model_Director();
00048     virtual ~Model_Director();
00049 
00050     Model& build_model(Model_Builder& builder);
00051 };
00052 
00053 #endif /* MODEL_DIRECTOR_H_ */
